title: Wake Me Up
lyrics:
You're waking me up
I hope I land on two feet
Clueless up until today
Writing off everyone that tells me anything
Stubborn locks of gold
Hiding my face inside of my head

Running my mouth but not telling you how I feel

How I feel



Until now I've kept this to myself

I've been sleeping right through it all

It feels good to finally figure out

I needed this all along



You're waking me up

Everything feels different

You're waking me up

Everything is solid gold



You're waking me up

I never saw the bright side

Not up until today

I always sought the darkness in everything

Stubborn locks of gold

Hiding my face inside of my head

Running my mouth but not telling you how I feel

How I feel



Until now I've kept this to myself

Been sleeping right through it all



You're waking me up

Everything feels different

You're waking me up

Everything is solid gold



You're waking me up

Everything feels different

You're waking me up

You're waking me up



Everything I see melts with my eyes

Every thought I have grows with the vines



You're waking me up

Everything feels different

You're waking me up

Everything is solid gold



You're waking me up

Everything feels different

You're waking me up

You're waking me up
